name: Ingested
description: '''Ingested''' is an English [[death metal]] and [[deathcore]] band from [[Manchester]], formed in 2006. The band currently consists of vocalist Josh Davies, guitarists Sean Hynes and Andrew Virrueta, bassist Thomas O'Malley, and drummer Lyn Jeffs. The band has released seven studio albums, the latest being ''The Tide of Death and Fractured Dreams'' in 2024 via [[Metal Blade Records]].
